import pymel.core
import pymel.core.general
import beastUtils

def getAutoTexRes(nodeName):
        r = str(beastUtils.getAutomaticTextureResolution(nodeName))
        return r + " x " + r

def findTarget(entity, targets):
        entityNode = pymel.core.general.PyNode(entity)
        entityTargetID = entityNode.target.get()
        for t in targets:
                targetNode = pymel.core.general.PyNode(t)
                targetID = targetNode.uniqueID.get()
                if entityTargetID == targetID:
                        return targetNode
        return None

def findTargetByID(id, targets):
        for t in targets:
                targetNode = pymel.core.general.PyNode(t)
                targetID = targetNode.uniqueID.get()
                if id == targetID:
                        return targetNode
        return None


class AEbeastInstanceTemplate(pymel.core.ui.AETemplate):
        def __init__(self, nodeName):
                self.beginScrollLayout()
                self.beginLayout("Bake Properties", collapse=0)
                self.callCustom(self.addLiveTargetMenu, self.updateLiveTargetMenu, "liveTarget")
                self.endLayout()
                self.beginLayout("Texture Properties", collapse=0)
                self.addControl("bakeUVSet", label="Bake UV Set")
                self.addControl("textureResolution", label="Texture Resolution")
                self.addControl("autoTextureResolution", label="Automatic Texture Resolution", changeCommand=self.onAutoTextureResolutionChanged)
                self.addControl("texelScale", label="Texel Scale", changeCommand=self.onTexelScaleChanged)
                self.callCustom(self.addAutoTexResHint, self.updateAutoTexResHint, "texelScale")
                self.endLayout()
                self.endScrollLayout()
                self.suppress("instance")
                self.suppress("caching")
                self.suppress("nodeState")

        def onAutoTextureResolutionChanged(self, nodeName):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "textureResolution", node.autoTextureResolution.get())
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "texelScale", not node.autoTextureResolution.get())
                if hasattr(self, "autoTextureResolutionHint"):
                        self.autoTextureResolutionHint.setEnable(node.autoTextureResolution.get())

        def addAutoTexResHint(self, attrStr):
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                self.autoTextureResolutionHint = pymel.core.windows.textFieldGrp(text=getAutoTexRes(attr.node()), editable=False)

        def updateAutoTexResHint(self, attrStr):
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                self.onTexelScaleChanged(attr.node())

        def onTexelScaleChanged(self, nodeName):
                if hasattr(self, "autoTextureResolutionHint"):
                        self.autoTextureResolutionHint.setText(getAutoTexRes(nodeName))

        def emptyMenu(self, menuGrp):
                listOfMenuItems = pymel.core.windows.optionMenuGrp(menuGrp, query=True, itemListLong=True)
                pymel.core.windows.setParent(str(menuGrp) + "|OptionMenu", menu=True)
                for item in listOfMenuItems:
                        pymel.core.windows.deleteUI(item, menuItem=True)

        def addLiveTargetMenu(self, attrStr):
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                self.liveTargetMenuGrp = pymel.core.windows.optionMenuGrp(label="Live Target")
                self.updateLiveTargetMenu(attrStr)

        def updateLiveTargetMenu(self, attrStr):
                self.emptyMenu(self.liveTargetMenuGrp)
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                beastInstanceNode = attr.node()
                mayaInstance = pymel.core.general.listConnections(str(beastInstanceNode) + ".instance", d=True, s=False, t="transform")
                entities = pymel.core.general.listConnections(mayaInstance[0].shortName() + ".beastEntities", t="beastEntity")
                targets = pymel.core.general.ls(type="beastTarget")
                pymel.core.windows.setParent(self.liveTargetMenuGrp)
                for e in entities:
                        target = findTarget(e, targets)
                        if target is not None:
                                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label=target.shortName())
                selectedTargetID = beastInstanceNode.liveTarget.get()
                if len(selectedTargetID) > 0:
                        selectedTargetNode = findTargetByID(selectedTargetID, targets)
                        if selectedTargetNode is not None:
                                try:
                                        self.liveTargetMenuGrp.setValue(selectedTargetNode.shortName())
                                except:
                                        # instance is no longer part of selected target, but we still want to keep it if user is shuffling targets or something
                                        pass
                self.liveTargetMenuGrp.changeCommand(pymel.core.Callback(self.onSelectLiveTarget, attrStr))

        def onSelectLiveTarget(self, attrStr):
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                selectedTarget = self.liveTargetMenuGrp.getValue()
                selectedTargetNode = pymel.core.general.PyNode(selectedTarget)
                if selectedTargetNode is not None:
                        beastInstanceNode = attr.node()
                        beastInstanceNode.liveTarget.set(selectedTargetNode.uniqueID.get())
